headline: Does the Recent 10.9% Drop Make ADP a Bargain in 2025?
summary: Wondering if Automatic Data Processing is offering investors real value, or if it is walking a fine line between steady blue-chip and overvaluation? Let’s dive into the numbers together. Lately, the stock price has shown some turbulence, down 10.9% in the last month and -13.2% over the past year, despite returning a strong 63.8% over the past five years. This recent dip has caught attention, especially as broader market sentiment has shifted and macroeconomic concerns have weighed on many...
